results.title: 50 Micro-SaaS Ideas for 2025
results.content: The most promising micro-SaaS opportunities include AI-powered form validation, automated changelog generation, and developer status pages.

results.title: Underserved Markets for Solo Developers
results.content: Solo developers are finding success in niche B2B tools. The key is solving a specific pain point that larger companies ignore.

results.title: SaaS Pricing Trends 2025
results.content: The freemium model continues to dominate developer tools, with conversion rates averaging 3-5% from free to paid tiers.
